description:
TooltipTrigger wraps around a trigger element and a Tooltip. It handles opening and closing
the Tooltip when the user hovers over or focuses the trigger, and positioning the Tooltip
relative to the trigger.

[View Documentation](https://hopper.workleap.design/components/Tooltip)

placement.description: The placement of the element with respect to its anchor element.
placement.name: placement

isDisabled.description: Whether the tooltip should be disabled, independent from the trigger.
isDisabled.name: isDisabled

delay.description: The delay time for the tooltip to show up. [See guidelines](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/tooltip/#Immediate-or-delayed-appearance).
delay.name: delay

trigger.description: By default, opens for both focus and hover. Can be made to open only for focus.
trigger.name: trigger

isOpen.description: Whether the overlay is open by default (controlled).
isOpen.name: isOpen

defaultOpen.description: Whether the overlay is open by default (uncontrolled).
defaultOpen.name: defaultOpen

onOpenChange.description: Handler that is called when the overlay's open state changes.
onOpenChange.name: onOpenChange

shouldFlip.description:
Whether the element should flip its orientation (e.g. top to bottom or left to right) when
there is insufficient room for it to render completely.
shouldFlip.name: shouldFlip

containerPadding.description:
The placement padding that should be applied between the element and its
surrounding container.
containerPadding.name: containerPadding

offset.description:
The additional offset applied along the main axis between the element and its
anchor element.
offset.name: offset

crossOffset.description:
The additional offset applied along the cross axis between the element and its
anchor element.
crossOffset.name: crossOffset

placement.name: placement
